sections.heading: of advertising visible from main-traveled way; permit; rules and regulations
sections.text: The Department of Transportation may at its discretion require permits for advertising signs, displays, or devices which are placed or allowed to exist along or upon the Highway Beautification Control System or which are at

sections.heading: 39-1320 to 39-1320.11 constitute a reasonable and valid exercise of the police power which bears a substantial relation to the public health, safety, and general welfare, and are constitutional
sections.text: State v. Mayhew Products Corp., 204 Neb. 266, 281 N.W.2d 783 (1979).
